summary: Comprehensive monthly event log aligned to Wikipedia 2025 coverage; includes politics, conflicts, climate, tech, sports, and culture milestones.

events.details: US President Donald Trump issues sweeping trade tariffs on many countries, including a 10% baseline tariff for all imports

events.details: Hungary withdraws from the International Criminal Court after Israeli Prime Minister and accused war criminal Benjamin Netanyahu lands in Budapest for a state visit, in defiance of the International Criminal Court's arrest warrant against him

events.details: Colossal Biosciences showcases three grey wolves that are genetically modified to exhibit the characteristics of the dire wolf

events.details: During a concert performance by Rubby Pérez in Santo Domingo , a nightclub roof collapses , killing at least 231 people, including Pérez, and injures more than 200 others

events.details: 2025 Gabonese presidential election : Incumbent transitional President Brice Oligui Nguema wins a full term

events.details: The atmosphere of K2-18b , a candidate water world located 124 light-years away, is found to contain large quantities of dimethyl sulfide and/or dimethyl disulfide – two compounds that, on Earth , are only known to be produced by life

events.details: 2025 Canadian federal election : Following Justin Trudeau 's resignation as prime minister in January, former governor of the Bank of Canada Mark Carney becomes the Prime Minister of Canada five days later

events.details: 2025 Trinidad and Tobago general election : The UNC wins a majority government, defeating the incumbent PNM
